reviewText: I was hoping for more from this product. I know the description says that it is 11 min. long but the title, to me, was a little deceptive. "Building a Solar Home" should have read "A really brief look at Solar Energy" You can get much more information from just reading a few articles on building a solar home. This was more like an infomercial with nothing to sell at the end. While the photography was nice it has no substance past a brief explanation of Solar Power and certainly does not justify the money spent for it. I returned this item. Don't waste your money.
